CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(SoWLanguage__c,'German'), CASE( ProjectDurationMonthAuto__c , 1,'einem (1) Monat', 2,'zwei (2) Monaten', 3,'drei (3) Monaten', 4,'vier (4) Monaten', 5,'fünf (5) Monaten', 6,'sechs (6) Monaten', 7,'sieben (7) Monaten', 8,'acht (8) Monaten', 9,'neun (9) Monaten', 10,'zehn (10) Monaten', 11,'elf (11) Monaten', 12,'zwölf (12) Monaten', ''), CASE( ProjectDurationMonthAuto__c , 1,'one (1) month', 2,'two (2) months', 3,'three (3) months', 4,'four (4) months', 5,'five (5) months', 6,'six (6) months', 7,'seven (7) months', 8,'eight (8) months', 9,'nine (9) months', 10,'ten (10) months', 11,'eleven (11) months', 12,'twelve (12) months', ''))
CustomField.label: Project Duration Month(s) Text
